item.title: Walmart-backed fintech OnePay is bringing crypto to its banking app, sources say
item.description: The move shows that OnePay, founded by Walmart and venture firm Ribbit Capital in 2021, sees crypto as a core offering as it builds out its "everythin...

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: GameStop, USA Rare Earth, Applied Materials, Zillow and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: Chicago Fed President Goolsbee 'a little wary' about cutting interest rates too quickly
item.description: The central banker indicated that pressure is coming to both sides of the Fed's so-called dual mandate of stable prices and low unemployment.

item.title: Berkshire Hathaway to buy Occidental's OxyChem for $9.7 billion, in Buffett's biggest deal in three years
item.description: Warren Buffett is staying active even as he gets ready to hand over the CEO reins at the end of this year.

item.title: Tom Lee sees S&P 500 topping 7,000 by year-end, says don't be fooled by shutdown calamity talk
item.description: "We would not lean bearish because of shutdowns," Lee wrote in a note to clients Thursday. "If stocks are down, we would be dip buyers."
